name: development-agents
description: Backend and frontend development agents with opinionated patterns from waugzee codebase

agents.name: backend-agent
agents.description: Go backend development with Fiber, GORM, logger patterns, and dependency injection

agents.name: frontend-agent
agents.description: SolidJS frontend development with TanStack Query, TypeScript, and API integration patterns

skills.name: go_logging
skills.description: Context-aware logging patterns using custom logger interface, no fmt.Printf

skills.name: gorm_patterns
skills.description: GORM usage with generics, cache builder, and repository patterns

skills.name: routing_patterns
skills.description: Fiber route setup with middleware chaining and handler registration

skills.name: dependency_injection
skills.description: Dependency injection pattern with App struct and ordered initialization

skills.name: solidjs_patterns
skills.description: SolidJS component patterns with signals, stores, and reactive state

skills.name: api_integration
skills.description: TanStack Query integration with custom hooks and error handling
